text: Audible has a collection of books that members can listen to for free. So I downloaded a bunch of classics I read in school to see if I wanted to read any of them again. 1984. Brave New World. And The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn. I started reading it, and the racial slur that got Donald McNeil fired is all through the first chapter. A dozen times probably. It's really hard to listen to, so I stopped reading it.
